tuv.seg: What happens if you are arrested in Ireland?
Cad a tharlaíonn nuair a ghabhtar in Éirinn thú?
Find out more about warrants and the rules governing arrests
Aimsigh breis faisnéise faoi bharántais agus na rialacha a rialaíonn gabhálacha
What are the different types of bail, the refusal of bail, and the consquences of breaching bail?
Cad iad na saghsanna éagsúla de bhannaí, bannaí a dhiúltú, agus na hiarmhairtí a bhaineann le bannaí a shárú?
What is the legal basis for detaining you after you have been arrested?
Tá cur síos anseo ar an dlí a bhaineann le duine a choinneáil tar éis é/í a ghabháil
Unlawful arrest and detention
Gabháil agus coinneáil neamhdhleathach
This document discusses what constitutes unlawful arrest and detention in Ireland and how evidence produced from it is treated in court
Tá plé déanta anseo ar a bhfuil i gceist le gabháil agus coinneáil neamhdhleathach agus ar an mbealach a chaitear le fianaise a bhailítear dá bharr sna cúirteanna
What are the rules about your treatment when you have been arrested and are in Garda custody in Ireland?
Tá cur síos anseo ar mar a chaitear le duine atá faoi choimeád
What are your rights if you have been arrested and are being interviewed by the Garda Síochána (Irish police force)?
Tá cur síos anseo ar na cearta atá ag daoine atá gafa nuair atá agallamh dhá chur ag na Gardaí orthu
This document describes what happens when a suspect in a criminal investigation makes a statement
Tá cur síos anseo ar a tharlaíonn má dhéanann duine a bhfuil amhras coire air/uirthi ráiteas
Right to silence in criminal cases
Ceart chun tosta i gcásanna coiriúla
The Irish Constitution provides protection for everyone against self-incrimination
Déanann Bunreacht na hÉireann gach duine a chosaint i gcoinne féin-ionchoirithe
Find out more here
Tá breis faisnéise ar fáil anseo
Voluntary confessions to the Gardai can be used as evidence against you in a trial
Tá cur síos anseo ar na rialacha a bhaineann le hadmhálacha
What is the role of the Gardai in questioning and surveillance of the public?
Tá cur síos anseo ar an ról atá ag Gardaí i gceistiú agus faire ar an bpobal
The Gardai have certain powers to search premises and persons when they are investigating a crime in Ireland
Tá cur síos anseo ar na cumhachtaí atá ag na Gardaí áitribh agus daoine a chuardach
Extradition to and from Ireland
Eiseachadadh chuig agus ó Éirinn
What is extradition and when is someone extradited from Ireland to another country?
Cad é eiseachadadh agus cathain a dhéantar duine a eiseachadadh ó Éirinn go tír eile?
The law on extradition between Ireland and other countries including information on European Arrest Warrants
An dlí maidir le heiseachadadh idir Éirinn agus tíortha eile, lena n-áirítear faisnéis ar Bharántais Ghabhála Eorpacha
